item.title: About the author
item.author: sunsp.gis@gmail.com (Shipeng Sun)
item.description: My name is Shipeng Sun. I teach GIScience and GeoInformatics and conduct related research in the Department of Geography and Environmental Science at Hunter College, CUNY. My History To be honest, I’m not sure if you want to read a bunch of text here. So why don’t you just visit my personal website.
